languages.text: "Первичный химический анализ останков показывает... аномальный результат". {n}Звенящая металлическая нота прорезает вокс.{/n} "В них словно растворена боль жертв этой машины. И она циркулирует в стальных венах этого существа. Оно чувствует... все".

"The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."
languages.original_text: "Первичный химический анализ останков показывает... аномальный результат". {n}Звенящая металлическая нота прорезает вокс.{/n} "В них словно растворена боль жертв этой машины. И она циркулирует в стальных венах этого существа. Оно чувствует... все".

traits.locale_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains displays... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a ringing metallic note.{/n} "It is like the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

languages.text: 「遺体の最初の化学分析では…異常な結果が得られた」{n}ヴォクスから金属音が鳴り響く。「{/n}「まるでこの機械の犠牲者の痛みが溶け込んでいるかのようだ。それはこの生き物の金属静脈を循環し、すべて…感じることができる」
languages.original_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

traits.locale_text: 「遺体の最初の化学分析では…異常な結果が得られた」{n}ヴォクスから金属音が鳴り響く。「{/n}「まるでこの機械の犠牲者の痛みが溶け込んでいるかのようだ。それはこの生き物の金属静脈を循環し、すべて…感じることができる」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “对遗骸的初步化学分析显示……结果不正常。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了铿锵的金属音。{/n}“结果表明，这台机器所有的受害者都溶解在了痛苦之中。这些受害者的意识与痛苦在这台机器的金属血管里循环，它们能感觉到……一切。”
languages.original_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

traits.locale_text: “对遗骸的初步化学分析显示……结果不正常。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了铿锵的金属音。{/n}“结果表明，这台机器所有的受害者都溶解在了痛苦之中。这些受害者的意识与痛苦在这台机器的金属血管里循环，它们能感觉到……一切。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El análisis químico inicial de los restos arroja... un resultado fuera de lo normal». {n}El voco emite un sonido metálico.{/n} «Es como si el dolor de las víctimas de esta máquina estuviera disuelto en ellas. Circula por las venas metálicas de esta criatura. Puede sentirlo... todo».
languages.original_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

traits.locale_text: «El análisis químico inicial de los restos arroja... un resultado fuera de lo normal». {n}El voco emite un sonido metálico.{/n} «Es como si el dolor de las víctimas de esta máquina estuviera disuelto en ellas. Circula por las venas metálicas de esta criatura. Puede sentirlo... todo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die erste chemische Analyse der Überreste ergibt ... ein abnormales Ergebnis." {n}Das Vox stößt ein metallisches Geräusch aus.{/n} "Es ist, als wäre der Schmerz der Opfer dieser Maschine in ihr aufgelöst worden. Er zirkuliert in den metallenen Venen dieser Kreatur. Sie fühlt ... alles."
languages.original_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

traits.locale_text: "Die erste chemische Analyse der Überreste ergibt ... ein abnormales Ergebnis." {n}Das Vox stößt ein metallisches Geräusch aus.{/n} "Es ist, als sei der Schmerz der Opfer dieser Maschine in ihr aufgelöst worden. Er zirkuliert in den metallenen Venen dieser Kreatur. Sie fühlt ... alles."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'analyse chimique initiale des vestiges a produit un résultat... anormal. » {n}Le vox émet un bruit métallique.{/n} « C'est comme si la souffrance des sujets était dissoute dans ces résidus pour être ensuite redistribuée dans les veines de la créature. Elle peut... tout sentir. »
languages.original_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

traits.locale_text: « L'analyse chimique initiale des vestiges a produit un résultat... anormal. » {n}Le vox émet un bruit métallique.{/n} « C'est comme si la souffrance des sujets était dissoute dans ces résidus pour être ensuite redistribuée dans les veines de la créature. Elle peut... tout sentir. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Kalıntılar üzerinde yapılan ilk kimyasal analizler... Anormal bir sonuç verdi." {n}Vokstan metalik bir çınlama yükseliyor.{/n} "Bu makinenin kurbanlarının acısı, onun içine dağılmakta gibi görünüyor. Bu yaratığın metal damarlarında dolaşıyorlar. Makine, her şeyi... Hissedebiliyor."
languages.original_text: "The initial chemical analysis of the remains yields... an abnormal result." {n}The vox emits a clanging metallic note.{/n} "It is as if the pain of the victims of this machine is dissolved in them. It is circulating in the metal veins of this creature. It can feel... everything."

traits.locale_text: "Kalıntılar üzerine yapılan ilk kimyasal analizler... Anormal bir sonuç verdi." {n}Vokstan metalik bir çınlama yükseliyor.{/n} "Bu makinenin kurbanlarının acısı, onun içine dağılmakta gibi görünüyor. Bu yaratığın metal damarlarında dolaşıyor. Her şeyi... Hissedebiliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
